1273:3: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ dharmārthayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇam|
1273:4: yasya pramāṇaṃ na bhavetpramāṇaṃ kastasya kuryādvacanaṃ pramāṇam||2||
1273:18: viśvāmitraṃ ca caṇḍālī vasiṣṭhaṃ caiva urvaśī|
1273:19: na teṣāṃ brāhmaṇī mātā lokācārācca brāhmaṇāḥ||10||
1273:20: sadyaḥ patati māṃsena lākṣayā lavaṇena ca|
1273:23: viprāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tato māṃsāni varjayet||12||
1273:24: brāhmaṇatvaṃ na śāstreṇa na saṃskārairna jātibhiḥ|
1273:25: na kulena na vedena na karmaṇā bhavettataḥ||13||
1273:28: satyaṃ brahma tapo brahma brahma cendriyanigrahaḥ|
1273:29: sarvabhūte dayā brahma etad brāhmaṇa lakṣaṇam||15||
1273:30: satyaṃ nāsti tapo nāsti nāsti cendriyanigrahaḥ|
1273:33: maithunaṃ nādhigacchanti te viprāste ca brāhmaṇāḥ||17||
1273:35: caṇḍālo'pi hi tatrasthastaṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ||18||
1273:58: na ca te brāhmaṇīputrāste ca lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ|
1273:60: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ na kulaṃ pradhānaṃ kulena kiṃ śīlavivarjitena|
1273:61: bahavo narā nīcakula prasūtāḥ svargaṃ gatāḥ śīlamupetya dhīrāḥ ||30||
1273:63: urubhyāṃ vaiśyaḥ saṃjātaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdraka eva ca||31||
1273:64: pāṇḍostu viśrutaḥ putraḥ sa vai nāmnā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ|
1273:66: ke ca te brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam|
1273:67: etadicchāmi bho jñātuṃ tad bhavān vyākaroti me||33||
1273:70: yadā sarvaṃ para-dravyaṃ pathi vā yadi vā gṛhe|
1273:75: maithunaṃ hi sadā tyaktaṃ caturthaṃ brahmalakṣaṇam||37||
1273:77: sarvabhūta dayā śaucaṃ tapaḥ śaucañca pañcamam||38||
1273:79: tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāṃ śeṣāḥ śūdrā yudhiṣṭhira||39||
1273:80: na kulena na jātyā vā kriyābhirbrāhmaṇo bhavet|
1273:81: caṇḍālo'pi hi vṛtastho brāhmaṇaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira||40||
1273:83: phalena na samarthaṃ ca brāhmaṇaḥ syādyudhiṣṭhira||40 a||
1273:86: sarve vai yonijā martyāḥ sarve mūtrapurīṣiṇaḥ|
1273:93: jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthe parārthe yasya jīvitam|
1273:94: ahorātraṃ caretkṣāntiṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ||45||
1273:99: kṣamā dayā damo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ smṛtirghṛṇā|
1273:106: muktaścarati yo dharmaṃ tameva brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ||51||
1273:107: yadā na kurute pāpaṃ sarvabhūteṣu dāruṇam|
1273:108: kāyena manasā vācā brahma sampadyate tadā||52||
1273:109: asmābhiruktaṃ yadidaṃ dvijānāṃ mohaṃ nihantuṃ hatabuddhiṃkānām|
1273:110: gṛhmantu santo yadi yuktametanmuñcantvathāyuktamidaṃ yadi syāt||53||
